releases.body:
## What's Changed
* chore(deps): gha node 20 upgrade by @zepeng811 in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/463

## New Contributors
* @zepeng811 made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/463

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/compare/release-2024-05-21T165757...release-2024-06-21T005221

## What's Changed
* Update bridged USDC standard by @circle-aloychan in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/458


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/compare/release-2024-05-06T200244...release-2024-05-21T165757

## What's Changed
* Fix Foundry installation and make miscellaneous changes by @circle-aloychan in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/455


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/compare/release-2024-04-30T221637...release-2024-05-06T200244

## What's Changed
* Add Celo related files by @zhenghui-w in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/453

## New Contributors
* @zhenghui-w made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/453

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/compare/release-2024-04-01T175741...release-2024-04-30T221637

## What's Changed
* Modernize development environment by @circle-aloychan in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/442

## New Contributors
* @circle-aloychan made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/442

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/compare/release-2024-03-15T223309...release-2024-04-01T175741

## What's Changed
* Update bridged_USDC_standard.md by @blincf in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/441


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/compare/release-2024-03-14T204556...release-2024-03-15T223309

## What's Changed
* Update bridged_USDC_standard.md by @blincf in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/440

## New Contributors
* @blincf made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/440

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/compare/release-2024-01-23T211210...release-2024-03-14T204556

## What's Changed
* Removes 'Upgraded' as a keyword from verification tool by @alecps in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/180
* [CENT-240] location of initialized by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/182
* Adding upgrade documentation by @o-a-hudson in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/186
* adds et000, et015, et016, et012 by @alecps in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/185
* Fixes incorrect test by @o-a-hudson in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/184
* add utility script for generating transaction data field by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/183
* Infura based validator by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/188
* Adds initialized to checkVariables; adds single function to lookup in… by @o-a-hudson in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/187
* Replaced FiatToken with FiatTokenV1 in validate.js by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/190
* Enforces use of local ganache for truffle testing by @o-a-hudson in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/189
* Update verification instructions for added truffle script by @o-a-hudson in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/191
* add check that FiatTokenV1 is initialized by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/193
* checkDiff validates Etherscan source code by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/192
* adds echidna to test suite [CENT-186] by @alecps in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/195
* [CENT-255] Added unit tests for 0xfffff...ff input by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/197
* Mention pause / unpause events by @anders94 in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/200
* add tx data decoder and use async/await for encoding/decoding tests by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/201
* Uncommented new packages by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/202
* added contract block to allow truffle-test single file execution by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/198
* Adds codebuild event rule for failed builds by @o-a-hudson in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/196
* decoder: add optional filename param, parse bytes as hex by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/203
* Adds permission to push build notifications by @o-a-hudson in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/205
* Remove web3 dependency by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/206
* Configures buildspec for notifications by @o-a-hudson in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/204
* Fixes build script grep exit error; adds more descriptive output by @o-a-hudson in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/207
* remove decoder dependency on truffle and ganache by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/208
* MINT prototype by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/209
* All tests use global Accounts object from AccountUtils. by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/211
* Increase code coverage by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/212
* Changed MintController MintableTokenInterface token to MinterManagementInterface minterManager by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/213
* Add removeController() function by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/214
* Fix build failure #214 by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/215
* Fix typo in readme by @huaweigu in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/216
* remove encoder and decoder tools by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/219
* cleanup by @eztierney in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/220
* add cloudformation template for codebuild project by @tjbaker in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/222
* [CENT-331]: Unify checkVariables and checkState by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/221
* Switch to CSV file verification by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/223
* Basic tests by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/224
* add requirement to configureController(c,m) that m is not 0 by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/225
* [CENT-367] Rewrite unit tests to use MasterMinter by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/226
* Travis CI integration by @eztierney in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/227
* Merge master into multi-issuer to pick up CI changes. by @eztierney in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/231
* [CENT-366] Fine-tune when to print missing unit tests by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/232
* [CENT-355] Write ArgumentTests by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/230
* [CENT-392] write README for MINT p0 by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/229
* [CENT-361] Modify TokenTestUtils function buildExpectedState/getActualState by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/228
* [CENT-355] Write ArgumentTests by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/234
* create parallel travis test environments by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/235
* Correct typos, and make indent level consistent by @gin in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/237
* Update license year 2019 by @EvertonMelo in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/241
* Added error msgs to require statements in minting/* contracts by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/242
* Fixes expectRevert not checking revert string by @o-a-hudson in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/250
* Solidity style fixes to multi-issuer contracts by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/243
* CENT642: Move MinterManagementInterface to its own file by @0xj0hnny in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/251
* Lack of check might lead to gas burn by @0xj0hnny in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/248
* explicit conversion of minterManager to address type by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/271
* Adds integrity, tree check on dependencies before testing by @o-a-hudson in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/261
* #252: add null address check by @0xj0hnny in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/247
* Modifier and spacing style fixes by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/269
* prefix parameters in MintController with underscores for consistency by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/270
* removeController reverts if controllers[C] is 0 by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/273
* CENT-631 - No way to decrement an allowance without reconfiguring minter by @mgrissa in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/249
* remove hardcoded boolean values being returned from three functions by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/275
* Updates dependency installation instructions by @o-a-hudson in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/276
* CENT-639 & CENT-643 - Remove empty Constructor & Adding getters for controllers and minterManager  by @mgrissa in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/277
* Document multi-issuer contracts according to NatSpec guidelines by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/274
* Added copy of MasterMiner code as a single file by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/280
* [Chore] Fix link in tokendesign.md by @cgst in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/279
* Added unit tests by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/282
* End to end tests by @mirathewhite in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/283
* Add migration to deploy master minter by @eztierney in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/284
* Enable syntax highlighting by @dmdque in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/286
* [COLD-1428] Bump handlebars from 4.0.11 to 4.5.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/288
* Bump lodash from 4.17.10 to 4.17.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/289
* Bump js-yaml from 3.12.0 to 3.13.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/290
* Bump mixin-deep from 1.3.1 to 1.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/291
* Bump fstream from 1.0.11 to 1.0.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/293
* Bump npm from 6.2.0 to 6.13.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/292
* Modernize codebase by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/296
* FiatTokenV1.1: Rescuable by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/299
* Slither fixes by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/300
* Gas Abstraction by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/301
* Provide transferWithMultipleAuthorizations in FiatTokenUtil by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/302
* Use token name instead of hard-coding "FiatToken" in EIP712 domain definition [L01] by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/303
* Update NatSpec comments [L02] by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/304
* Nullify authorization before transferring [L03] by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/305
* Remove unnecessary inheritance [L04] by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/306
* Rename permitter in Permit.sol to owner for consistency with the EIP2612 spec [N02] by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/307
* V2 Upgrade by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/310
* Merge V2 branch by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/311
* V2.1 by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/317
* Add version method by @petejkim in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/320
* upgrade master minter contracts to v.0.6.12, merge multi-issuer branch to master by @walkerq in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/327
* Fiat Token v2.2 by @yvonnezhangc in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/425
* Add documentation for Bridged USDC Standard by @ams9198 in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/428
* Link to Bridged USDC Standard doc from README by @ams9198 in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/429
* chore(ci): implement code scanning by @jscaltreto in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/435

## New Contributors
* @anders94 made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/200
* @huaweigu made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/216
* @gin made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/237
* @EvertonMelo made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/241
* @0xj0hnny made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/251
* @mgrissa made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/249
* @cgst made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/279
* @dmdque made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/286
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/288
* @petejkim made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/296
* @yvonnezhangc made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/425
* @ams9198 made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/428
* @jscaltreto made their first contribution in https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/pull/435

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/circlefin/stablecoin-evm/compare/v1.0.0...release-2024-01-23T211210

commits.message: Update foundryup command to use correct flag (#528)
commits.author: Ahsan Shahab

commits.message: Automated Bytecode Verification for Tokens Following the Bridged USDC Standard (#474)
commits.author: Alex Kroeger

commits.message: add a GitHub workflow for automated bytecode verification, update bridged USDC standard documentation, update the entity name in copyright headers
commits.author: Alex Kroeger

commits.message: Fix Foundry installation and make miscellaneous changes (#455)
commits.author: Aloysius Chan

commits.message: Fix Foundry installations and make miscellaneous changes
commits.author: Aloysius Chan

commits.message: Fix pr-scan workflow and flaky tests
commits.author: Aloysius Chan

commits.message: Link to Bridged USDC Standard doc from README (#429)
commits.author: ams9198

commits.message: Update README to included Bridged USDC Standard doc
commits.author: Adrian Soghoian

commits.message: Add documentation for Bridged USDC Standard (#428)
commits.author: Erik Tierney

commits.message: Add documentation for Bridged USDC Standard
commits.author: Adrian Soghoian

commits.message: Add migration option to directly deploy v2.2 token
commits.author: Yvonne Zhang

commits.message: Add deploy script for MockERC1271 wallet
commits.author: Yvonne Zhang

commits.message: Add script to call read-only functions on a contract
commits.author: Aloysius Chan

commits.message: Add script to get blacklisted accounts
commits.author: Aloysius Chan

commits.message: Remove unused imports and fix solhint warnings
commits.author: Yvonne Zhang

commits.message: Allow omission of deadline check in permit
commits.author: Yvonne Zhang

commits.message: Add unified interface for EOA and contract wallet signatures
commits.author: Yvonne Zhang

commits.message: Re-route EIP-2612 and EIP-3009 functions to use SignatureChecker
commits.author: Yvonne Zhang

commits.message: Cached chain ID and domain separator
commits.author: Yvonne Zhang

commits.message: delete unnecessary relative path in deploy script
commits.author: Walker Mayerchak

commits.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:centrehq/centre-tokens into multi-issuer
commits.author: Walker Mayerchak

commits.message: Add additional checks to V2_1Upgrader test
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Add an intialization function for v2.1
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Remove functions not present in EIP-3009
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Embed utility contracts instead of linking
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Split up v2 deployment migration to multiple smaller migrations
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Make it possible to override FiatTokenProxy address in migrations
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Simplify upgrade procedure by making upgrade() not to take in any args
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Read addresses of various roles from config.js
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Update Truffle config to read the mnemonic and INFURA key from a file
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Move address verification from EIP712 to GasAbstraction and Permit
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Fix tests in #302 that were affected by changes in #305
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Fix pointer math for revert reason bubbling
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Remove the external call to check for paused state in FiatTokenUtil
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Document the format of the input for transferWithMultipleAuthorizations
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Rename permitter to owner in Permit.sol for consitency
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Mark authorization as used before performing action
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Use token name in EIP712Domain definition
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Improve test coverage and refactor some tests
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Implement Permit for compatibility with the draft EIP2612
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Add increaseAllowance and decreaseAllowance to FiatTokenV2
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Add ethereumjs-util package and update packages
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Relax some frequently silenced solhint rules
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Refactor ERC20 approve, transfer, and transferFrom
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Add a test to ensure changing access modifier doesn't break things
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Fix local variable shadowing where appropriate
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Mark public functions that are never invoked internally as external
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Add rescuable to storage slot test
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Run all V1 tests for V1.1
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Ensure locally installed prettier is used to format Solidity code
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Add storage slot test to ensure slots are retained
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Move V1 tests to test/v1 and fix lint errors
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Fix tests that broke due to Truffle upgrade
commits.author: Peter Jihoon Kim

commits.message: Add migration to deploy master minter
commits.author: Erik Tierney

commits.message: Merge branch 'multi-issuer' of https://github.com/centrehq/centre-tokens into multi-issuer
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: added copy of MasterMiner code from etherscan (#280)
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: added copy of MasterMiner code from etherscan
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: Document multi-issuer contracts according to NatSpec guidelines (#274)
commits.author: walkerq

commits.message: CENT-639 & CENT-643 - Remove empty Constructor & Adding getters for controllers and minterManager  (#277)
commits.author: mgrissa

commits.message: remove hardcoded boolean values being returned from three functions (#275)
commits.author: walkerq

commits.message: CENT-631 - No way to decrement an allowance without reconfiguring minter (#249)
commits.author: mgrissa

commits.message: prefix parameters in MintController with underscores for consistency (#270)
commits.author: walkerq

commits.message: (style) add newline to configureMinter, reorder visibility modifier in removeMinter (#269)
commits.author: walkerq

commits.message: Adds integrity check on development environment dependencies (#261)
commits.author: Oliver Hudson

commits.message: Lack of check might lead to gas burn (#248)
commits.author: Johnny Liang

commits.message: Move MinterManagementInterface to its own file (#251)
commits.author: Johnny Liang

commits.message: explicit conversion of minterManager to address type
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: Fixes expectRevert not checking revert string (#250)
commits.author: Oliver Hudson

commits.message: visibility modifiers come first per style guide
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: modifiers moved to their own line per style guide
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: delete unnecessary leading ./ in import Ownable
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: remove extra line in comment of configureController
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: remove double space in MintController constructor
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: use double quotes in import statements per style guide
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: line spacing according to Solidity style guide
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: Added error msgs to require statements in minting/* contracts (#242)
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: Update indent levels to be consistent
commits.author: Luigi

commits.message: cleaned up Completeness output and colors/checkmarks (#232)
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: Merge master into multi-issuer to pick up CI changes. (#231)
commits.author: Erik Tierney

commits.message: beforeEach sends MintController as argument to initialization function
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: Fixed bug in MasterMinter.sol constructor and added MasterMinter unit tests
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: add requirement to configureController(c,m) that m is not 0 (#225)
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: add cloudformation template for codebuild project (#222)
commits.author: Trevor Baker

commits.message: Using library funciton clone(), removing logObject, and creating checkMINTp0 function for unit tests
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: replaced literal objects with actual objects
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: checkVariables takes as input either FiatTokenV1 or MintController
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: updated new unit tests to use minterManager instead of token
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: changing token to minterManager and MintableTokenInterface to MinterManagerInteface
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: replacing A. with Accounts. for code clarity
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: replacing use of tokenUtils.tokenOwnerAccount with Accounts.tokenOwnerAccont
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: All tests use global Accounts object from AccountUtils.
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: Added comments, events, and modified Controller to use workers instead of minters
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: MINT p0 contracts and test framework
commits.author: Erik Tierney

commits.message: provide --abi-path option allowing decoder to be run with just node instead of with truffle and ganache, by passing path to abi json. To get abi from truffle, use --truffle-artifact instead of --contract. Expand decoder help text.
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: Fixes grep exit error; adds more descriptive messages; fixes typo
commits.author: Oliver Hudson

commits.message: Adds permission to push build notifications
commits.author: Oliver Hudson

commits.message: print decoder output to stream only if not saved to file
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: use latest maintenance version of web3js, 0.20.6
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: allow user of decoder script to specify name of output file, and always parse values of type bytes to hex
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: Adds notification configuration to codebuild pipeline
commits.author: Oliver Hudson

commits.message: added contract block to allow truffle-test single file execution
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: each test file executes new and upgraded token
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: added contract block to allow truffle-test single file execution
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: reuse decodedDataJson and example data strings in tests
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: Uncommented truffle-hdwallet-provider package declaration and updated README files.
commits.author: mirathewhite

commits.message: write output from data decoder to file
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: add tx data decoder and use async/await for encoding/decoding tests
commits.author: Walker

commits.message: add check that FiatTokenV1 is initialized
